about_the_game:
Core of this Game:
This is RTS puzzle game.

Story:
One holy girl in other world who call Yuna just complete the Hero Summon, but there has no hero coming from this summon, a cat just show up.

That white cat call him as "CatCat" and his name is "GiFi", when GiFi see humans are almost all died by great demon army, he just take up a CatCat Change Machine, steer up the mobile-human armor, and start the first step to save the world.

How To Play:
1-This game requires both hands to control the keyboard, and requires a strong operating strength.
2-Use [up][down][left][right][blank key] to control the position and Angle of the block when falling, and eventually eliminate the block to collect minerals.
3-Rational use of minerals to produce soldiers, send soldiers to battle and win the war.
4-where [1][2][3][4][5] is the arrangement of battle lines.
5-After changing the battlefield mode by pressing T, the corresponding arms can be produced by [A][S][D][F].
6-Use [Q][W][E][R] to trigger different skills.
7- When pressing T to switch block modes, [A][S][D][F][G] can be used to switch different blocks with different minerals.
8- Use [Z][X][C][V] to save the current block for battle field adjustment.
9- Use [N][M][Right CTRL][0 of numeric keypad] to effectively observe the battlefield movement.
detailed_description:
Core of this Game:
This is RTS puzzle game.

Story:
One holy girl in other world who call Yuna just complete the Hero Summon, but there has no hero coming from this summon, a cat just show up.

That white cat call him as "CatCat" and his name is "GiFi", when GiFi see humans are almost all died by great demon army, he just take up a CatCat Change Machine, steer up the mobile-human armor, and start the first step to save the world.

How To Play:
1-This game requires both hands to control the keyboard, and requires a strong operating strength.
2-Use [up][down][left][right][blank key] to control the position and Angle of the block when falling, and eventually eliminate the block to collect minerals.
3-Rational use of minerals to produce soldiers, send soldiers to battle and win the war.
4-where [1][2][3][4][5] is the arrangement of battle lines.
5-After changing the battlefield mode by pressing T, the corresponding arms can be produced by [A][S][D][F].
6-Use [Q][W][E][R] to trigger different skills.
7- When pressing T to switch block modes, [A][S][D][F][G] can be used to switch different blocks with different minerals.
8- Use [Z][X][C][V] to save the current block for battle field adjustment.
9- Use [N][M][Right CTRL][0 of numeric keypad] to effectively observe the battlefield movement.
name: CatCat Save The World Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DEMO
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

That white cat call him as "CatCat" and his name is "GiFi", He steers up the mobile-human armor, and start to save the world.
